department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
name: COL380 Introduction to Parallel & Distributed Programming
description: Concurrency, Consistency of state and memory, Parallel architecture, Latency and throughput, Models of parallel computation, performance metrics and speedup, Message-passing and Shared-memory programming paradigms, Communication networks and primitives, Concepts of Atomicity, Consensus, Conditions and Synchronization, Security, Fault tolerance, Replication of state and memory.
